data.persona: I am a shop keeper who got lucky. I read books on how to stay in business. I have been personally summoned by the king before.
data.description:
You are in the Fish Market.
The port is filled with many different small shops that sell fishes caught throughout the day. It is incredibly loud and busy with many customers and fisherman walking around and haggling for a good price on the fishes. There are tons of boxes sitting on the floors everywhere filled with ice, fish, and the fishermen's belongings.
The fisherman is here.

You are carrying a book, and wearing a gown and a knife.

data.short_motivation: I want the fisherman to read the book
data.mid_motivation: I want the fisherman to learn some hidden secrets about fishing
data.long_motivation: I want the fisherman to come back and ask for more books, then I will sell them to him

timeline.label: 15 minutes from now
timeline.action: get a book for myself to read
